titles.title: EARN IT Act of 2020
EARN IT Act of 2020
Eliminating Abusive and Rampant Neglect of Interactive Technologies Act of 2020
Eliminating Abusive and Rampant Neglect of Interactive Technologies Act of 2020
EARN IT Act of 2020
To establish a National Commission on Online Child Sexual Exploitation Prevention, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
